QuestData.Title: One of Our Own
QuestData.Description: Da bird-men captured me while I was gettin' da lay a da land.$B$BWe been workin' on an outpost for you just round dis mountain so your will be spreadin' all over da continent.$B$BThings not be goin' well.$B$BI be needin' your assistance, commander. Can you tell dem that I mean no harm so I can be showin' you da outpost?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Shadow-Sage Iskar and convince him to let Shadow Hunter Ukambe free.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank da spirits you showed up. Dey hear my prayers.
